data.title: Connecting Nobel Prize winning Physicists to the world tree
data.meta_description: This is not a question, but the category information suggests that this category is pretty open.  I noticed ...  or let me know if there is a problem.
data.text:
Thanks for the suggestions.

The 5 laureates in my post would be a great start for those who have profiles. It's actually only 4 tasks because Chandrasekhar and Raman are nephew and uncle.

Here are some winners with no profile at all as of yesterday:

1919 Johannes Stark

1920 Charles Édouard Guillaume

1924 Manne Siegbahn

1926 Jean Baptiste Perrin

1928 Owen Willans Richardson

1936 Victor Francis Hess

1937 Clinton Joseph Davisson

1943 Otto Stern

1944 Isidor Isaac Rabi

1946 Percy Williams Bridgman

1952 Edward Mills Purcell

1954 Edward Bothe

1955 Polykarp Kusch

1957 Tsung-Dao Lee

1958 Ilya Frank

1958 Igor Yevgenyevich Tamm

This should be complete through 1946. There are many more after that.

Thanks to Vic Watt and Sharon Casteel, three of the names above can be crossed off. They have profiles and are connected. I just added a basic profile for Rabi, but he's still unconnected. There are lots of grandchildren, so a connection may be relatively easy.

Edit, December 2020. Three more of the original ten have profiles now, leaving only 3. I have added the next 3 chronologically, making the list complete to 1955.

Edit, February 2024. Several more profiles have been created, so I again added 3 more missing names. Progress on connecting those who do have profiles has been good as well.

Just as a quick look, I checked first 9 names from the opening image at the UCLA site. Those marked living were listed that way on the site or in a quick search, but there is no guarantee. Those in bold could be the best targets for a project. The web site has 83 women, so this only scratches the surface.

Rosalind Franklin, has profile, connected

Helen R. Quinn, living

Myriam Sarachik, living

Maria Goeppert Mayer, Nobel winner, has profile, connected

Patricia Elizabeth Cladis 1937-2017, no profile

Hertha Sponer has a .ged import profile with no family of any kind

Gail Gulledge Hanson, living

Sau Lan Wu, living

Sulamith Löw (married name Goldhaber), no profile.

One more name jumped off the page. Lise Meitner (1878-1969) has a profile but is not connected. She a perfect example of a woman who was denied opportunities because she was a woman (and a Jew in 1930s Germany) but persevered to make huge contributions in science.
